attributes.action: intervene in the madness of the proposed isle of wight council changes to education and tell us why this is happening truthfully.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a mother on the Isle of Wight and appalled at the Isle of Wight council for their handling of the education issues and for appearing not to listen to people who are concerned for the immediate and future welfare of the island and it's children.  The arguments for the proposals appear patronising and without thorough understanding of what is wrong with the Island education system in the first place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
